question: 経済学
sourceMnemonic: You know how <ja>経済</ja> is economics, right? Well, add <kanji>study</kanji> to that and you have the study of economics, aka <vocabulary>economics</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. It will help to know <ja>経済</ja> as well.
